column1: Baby Barnaby's////I only stayed in the restaurant for a short while before heading back to work
column2: but I loved the food and the water I was served. Good tasting water is vital to me for any restaurant I visit and Baby Barnaby's made a good impression with theirs. Unfortunately
column3: I couldn't enjoy my food there along with the water
column4: but portion was very filling with an exceptional price. My waitress was great and I would hope to have her again whenever I make another visit.
